short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the elegance and power of the BMW M4 with stunning visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Showcase the sleek and powerful BMW M4 in breathtaking, high-definition visuals.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A modern interface reflecting the sophistication and performance of the iconic BMW M4.
⏰ Clock and Date: Easily keep track of time with an elegant display that matches the BMW aesthetic.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your go-to websites with one click.
🎮 Play Games: Access thrilling car games to immerse yourself in the world of speed and performance.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search seamlessly with your preferred engine for fast and effective results.
🚀 More Extension: Explore additional features to elevate your browsing experience with the BMW M4 flair.
